document_data.name: Halthara Summergarth
document_data.mainbody: '''Halthara Summergarth''' was a [[halfling]] woman of the city of [[Procampur]] in [[the Vast]].
document_data.History: Around [[1368 DR]], Summergarth was a ship-owner and a maker of barrels and crates, and conducted her trade from [[Summergarth Facilitations]] in Procampur. She was also an active [[Harper]] agent, though she remained based in Procampur.
